name: World Imports Rustic Lantern Pendant Light - Hastings Collection
description: One-of-a-kind, the Hastings Collection 4-Light Rust Hanging Pendant from World Imports is crafted with hand-wrought iron, bringing elegant warmth to a hallway, entryway or dining area. The rust finish evokes classic Old World style, while the unique, open-frame design creates eye-catching appeal. Featuring an adjustable hanging length to accommodate any space, the fixture includes all necessary hardware for installation.Hand-wrought iron with rust finish for a classic, elegant lookAdjustable hanging length for versatile placement optionsHardware included for installationUses 4 candelabra bulbs, 60-Watt maximum each (sold separately)Lantern-style design with unique, open frame creates an eye-catching centerpiece5-1/4 in. D canopyCoordinates with other fixtures in the Hastings collection for a complete lighting theme throughout your homeHome Depot Protection Plan:
